Text: hey thereHi Mark How are things in Texas Hope everything is going well I am in LA these days and hopefully will be settled here soon Ive been looking into a few positions at different studios including Sony Fox Disney Paramount and Universal I would love to get some contacts so I can send my resume directly to people in development marketing or promotions and I was hoping that you would be able to give me a few names I understand you are looking for a new job too Best of luck I still think you should become a dance instructor though Let me know how it goes Take care and I look forward to hearing from you Thanks Stephanie Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger
